# Sample Markdown Document

This is a sample markdown file for testing the RAG system.

## Introduction

This document contains structured content with headers to test the markdown loader.

## Features

The RAG system includes:
- PDF document support
- Markdown document support
- Text document support
- Semantic chunking
- Vector embeddings

## Technical Details

### Embeddings
The system supports both sentence-transformers and Google embeddings.

### Vector Database
Pinecone is used for scalable vector storage and retrieval.

### Answer Generation
Google Gemini generates contextual answers with source citations.

## Conclusion

This file validates markdown parsing and metadata extraction.
